name: Dome - Visual Example
description:
This is a short visual demo of a game that I was working on for quite some time. 

This game was planed to be a survival game. I actually built a lot of multiplayer features alongside a custom command prompt executable for running servers. However my interests in this project led into the graphics department for too long, and by the time it was done I moved on due to scope issues.

Made circa 2018 - 2019

By:  Caleb Palmer
